statement.p: In 41.94 of the last 31 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{31}}={0.4194}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{31}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4194}\cdot{31}={13.0014}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 31-13.0014=17.9986 We round that as requested to 18.
